overview: Saúl is ready to tell his father that he is homosexual, fearful of his possible denial, he does not know if his father will accept or throw him out of the house, since the father with his own marital problems is a very serious and proper man who works as a judicial officer. But when Saúl gets back from school, he finds a surprise about his family that he will never forget.
title: Love Doesn't Exist
